snippet.title: Causa, Voices of the Dusk | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
What are you willing to sacrifice to make your Cause prevail? Decide & build your path to Victory in the new CCG Causa, Voices of the Dusk! 

Causa, Voices of the Dusk is a F2P multiplayer collectible card game in which players assume the role of powerful Leaders struggling to make their faction's ideals prevail in a vast and exotic fantasy world. Coming soon to PC, PS4 and Xbox One!

Register to be part of the upcoming demos at https://playcausa.com/subscribe and follow Causa on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1034040/Causa_Voices_of_the_Dusk/

Follow us on our social channels: 
* Demo Sign Ups: https://playcausa.com/subscribe   
* Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1034040/Causa_Voices_of_the_Dusk/
* Discord: https://discordapp.com/2mjq7TT
* Subreddit: www.reddit.com/r/playcausa
* Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/playcausa
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/playcausa
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playcausa

Official Website: http://playcausa.com
